amendment.description: At the end of the bill, before the short title, insert the following: SEC. __. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used for high-speed rail in the State of California or for the California High-Speed Rail Authority.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds to be used for high-speed rail in the State of California or for the California High-Speed Rail Authority.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Denham amendment (A052) Agreed to by recorded vote: 239 - 185 (Roll no. 448).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Denham amendment (A052) Agreed to by recorded vote: 239 - 185 (Roll no. 448).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A052) offered by Mr. Denham.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
